DOC.brief_summary: This Phase II , single arm , open label clinical trial . 60 RVO patient ( include 30 BRVO 30 CRVO , respectively ) enrol study . The study include fixed treatment period ( 3 month ) PRN period ( 6 month ) . In fixed treatment period patient receive 3 consecutive monthly intravitreal 0.5 mg Conbercept . In PRN period , patient monthly visit retreatment need accord retreatment criterion pre-specified .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Conbercept Macular Edema Secondary Retinal Vein Occlusion

Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) letter score study eye ≤ 73（Snellen equivalent 20/40） . Central retinal thickness OCT study eye ≥ 320 μm . 1 . Brisk afferent pupillary defect . 2 . History intraocular and/or periocular corticosteroid use study eye within 3 month , and/or history use steroid systemic ( p.o. , i.m. , i.v . ) within 1 month . 4 . Any active infection involve ocular include blepharitis , infectious conjunctivitis , keratitis , scleritis , endophthalmitis either eye . 5 . Any inflammatory cell detect anterior chamber and/or vitreous study eye . 6 . Presence nonRVO disease , opinion investigator , might cause macular edema , AMD ( wet dry ) , diabetes retinopathy , uveitis etc . 7 .
